name: VZAZZ
overview:
VZAZZ is an easy to use social display marketing network created exclusively for local business. Finally, businesses have the tools to create, socially display, virally share and interact in real time with consumers at the time of interest!

VZAZZ combines the best of Craigslist (local targeting), Groupon (sharing via e-mail on local in-store items, offers and services), and Pinterest (social sharing with viral consumer interaction).

CREATE – VZAZZ makes it easy for you create high resolution images, rich media and even video displays in seconds.

EXPOSE – Release your product displays into the local community by item, category or into new markets to millions of people.ready to buy. Tell the world what’s in your store (s) see what they like and buy.

SHARE – Share your merchandise with neighborshood communities, across city metro areas or many cities.

SELL – With millions of people searching for items and services everyday.

VZAZZ increases the chances of getting in-front of as many people as a business can which increases the opportunity to sell more items than any other local marketing option.

milestones.description:
THE FIRST CROWD SHOPPING NETWORK
Designed for merchants, boutiques and services businesses to create, share and sell in-store products and services to consumers at the time of their interest! 

VZAZZ is in an easy to use social display sharing network
